topics.body:
In some ways, Seven is the best Ultra, In others, He's one of the worst.

He has no time limit, He can throw the Eye slugger multiple times in a row, But He's more vulnerable to extreme hot and cold temperatures, He keeps his injuries when he's not transformed...And I haven't actually watched ultraseven, So I don't know much else.

topics.body:
So exosuits are here.

Short version is Daewoo shipping is now making exosuits for shipworkers to help increase productivity and reduce the probability of accidents and so forth.  Basically the reason why this is important is that exosuits don't just have military applications, but that in construction areas and so forth it can prevent accidents and make work go faster.  The main limitation of these suits is that they still need a power cord.

This is good news cause hypothetically let's say a I-beam falls on you; right now you're fucking dead, in ten years exosuits will let you catch it preventing you from going splat.
